comments.body:
My understanding is that all the limitations and funny quirks of the cmd shell are still present today because MS doesn't want to break legacy scripts that relies on how it has behaved for the past two decades. Breaking this behaviour would make them very unpopular among big business entities relying on cmd to behave in a certain way.
If anything Powershell is supposed to overcome these limitations.
